tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select userSessionId as "Sessions",duration/100 as "Duration (s)",${split.usql} as "${split.id}",useractioncount as "Action Count",numberOfRageClicks as "Rage Cnt",(duration / userActionCount) as "Engagement Rate", (numberOfRageClicks*100/useractioncount) as "Rage Rate", (totalErrorCount*100/useractioncount) as "Error Rate" FROM usersession where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production") and useraction.name="payment/checkout" ${uspClause} and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL order by duration desc

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","5m") as "Start Time",${split.usql},CONDITION(avg(visuallyCompleteTime), where and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL) as "Visually Complete" FROM useraction where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production") and useraction.name="payment/checkout"  ${uspClause} and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(${split.usql},10),CONDITION(count(${split.usql}), where and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production") and useraction.name="payment/checkout"  ${uspClause} and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","5m") as "Start Time",${split.usql},CONDITION(count(usersession.totalErrorCount), where and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production") and useraction.name="payment/checkout"  ${uspClause} and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(${split.usql},10),CONDITION(COUNT(*), where and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL and isExitAction=true) as "Count" FROM useraction where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production") and useraction.name="payment/checkout"  ${uspClause} and ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL
